title: can't type in chat
body: after every game i go into the lobby and then i can't type at all no words come out when i type this happens only in the cilent doe but not in game anyone know how to fix this

replies.body: bump its still happening its getting really bothersome to relog after every game to fix it

Your client might be having problems establishing a new connection with the chat servers. My first thought to fixing this would be to turn off "close client during game" if you currently have that on.
no it still happens i tried this but still happens
Maybe it's a connection issue? That's happened to me before in other games (and this one sometimes) because my connection is either amazing, or awful, with no inbetween.
